Premade Tabs

The NYC Core Framework provides two premade tab styles. Here is a simple, left-justified tab pattern:

You can change the justification of the tabs above with our flex classes(for centered tabs add .jc-center to the .tabs selector).

The example code below creates the preceding tabs.
